title: No Surrender
description: Fresh from grueling years of pilot training, Alyssa Trayhern couldn't believe the navy was about to crash-land her career. Butwhy else assign her as copilot to cocky jet jockey Clay Cantrell? Aly vowed to defy Clay's cruel hatred of her Trayhern name. Then rare glimpses into his vulnerable soul shook her rigid defenses ... and left her longing to surrender to the heady onslaught of bittersweet desire.Thrill to LOVE AND GLORY, the gripping new series as stirring as the American dream. Meet Noah, Alyssa and Morgan Trayhern, siblings bound by a tradition of familyhonor ... and nearly ripped apart by the tragic accusation that shadows their lives--and loves!
author: Lindsay McKenna
